entry.title: Gutter Cat Gang Twitter Hacked, At Least $750K Worth of NFTs Swiped
entry.summary: The Twitter account for the NFT project Gutter Cat Gang were hacked to promote a fake airdrop to an audience of more than 124,000 followers.

entry.title: Is Bitcoin an Investment or a Currency ?
entry.summary: Bitcoin is being explored as three distinct ideas: a currency, an asset and a commodity. Because regulation takes place mostly at state level, Bitcoin has become all three things simultaneously in different parts of the world.

entry.title: What is Hashing?
entry.summary: Hashing is one of the most crucial pieces of technology that keeps the Bitcoin network secure. But how does it work?

entry.title: Stepn Creator's Next Game Is a Social MMO Called Gas Hero
entry.summary: Gas Hero, from the developer of move-to-earn game Stepn, takes place in a dystopian world where a powerful AI has triggered nuclear war.

entry.title: What is the Lightning Network? Bitcoin's Scalability Solution.
entry.summary: Lightning Network is a scaling solution that attempts to address Bitcoin's slow transaction speeds and high transaction costs.

entry.title: Crypto, Stablecoins May Pose 'Threat to Financial Stability' if Widely Used: BIS Survey
entry.summary: Two dozen central banks are also expected to launch either wholesale or consumer-facing retail CBDCs by the end of the decade.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hash Rate Hits New All-Time High Amid Stagnating Prices
entry.summary: The computing power of the Bitcoin network is at its highest levels again, making the world’s largest cryptocurrency more secure than ever.

entry.title: Recovering Funds Transferred Via Bitcoin ATMs Is 'Virtually Untraceable', Say Iowa Authorities
entry.summary: Although they account for a fraction of the illicit transactions done in crypto, Bitcoin ATMs are disproportionately popular among scammers.

entry.title: PEPE Leads Meme Coin Losses as Fresh Token Launches Grab Trader’s Attention
entry.summary: The top meme coins are facing pressures due to the arrival of new meme coins coupled with losses in Bitcoin and Ethereum.

entry.title: Sarah Silverman Sues Meta, OpenAI for Training AI Models on Her Book
entry.summary: The comedian and two other authors say their work was used to train AI-powered chatbots without their permission.

entry.title: Crypto Code Commits Drop Despite Rising Prices
entry.summary: A decrease in the amount of development activity could be attributed to the explosive popularity of artificial intelligence technologies.

entry.title: AI Will Make Games 'Faster, Cheaper and Better': Unity CEO
entry.summary: “I don't think anybody's job on the creation side is going to be taken by an AI, but it will get taken by a human using AI."

entry.title: Crypto Booster Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Bought Bitcoin Despite Recent Claim: Report
entry.summary: Kennedy’s campaign also flip-flopped on who in his family owned the classic cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Ethereum Inventor Vitalik Buterin Has Advice for Bitcoiners
entry.summary: If Bitcoin wants to become more than payments, it needs to experiment more, says the blockchain innovator.

entry.title: ‘Instagram Minus Pics’: Musk and Zuckerberg Trade Taunts as Twitter Threat Threads Nears 100 Million Users
entry.summary: AI, the metaverse, and self-driving cars dropped off the radar as the tech founders grappled for social media dominance.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Winklevoss Calls on Silbert to Negotiate, Sues Him 3 Days Later
entry.summary: And Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao once again told his followers to ignore FUD.

entry.title: New ChatGPT Code Interpreter Can Prove to Flat Earthers That the Earth Is Round
entry.summary: Yes, it can revolutionize the way society works with computers... But we had a more important use case in mind.

entry.title: AI Generated Child Porn Outlawed In Louisiana
entry.summary: Using artificial intelligence to create sexualized deepfake images of children will bring lengthy jail sentences and hefty fines.

entry.title: AI Can Now Move Bitcoin With New Lightning Labs Tools
entry.summary: Large Language Models (LLM) like ChatGPT will now be able to hold, receive and send Bitcoin via the Lightning Network.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Solana Surges as Bitcoin and Ethereum Rally Rebound
entry.summary: Bitcoin hit a one-year high this week before settling back down by Saturday.

entry.title: Ethereum Core Dev Explains Why Proto-Danksharding Is a Big Deal
entry.summary: “We will be able to handle data much more efficiently, and in a cheaper way as well,” he said.

entry.title: Bitcoin Spot ETF Will Open Door to New Investors: Volatility Shares Co-Founder
entry.summary: "Why on Earth wouldn't they allow spot Bitcoin through," said Volatility Shares co-founder Justin Young.

entry.title: ‘AI Is My Muse’: Jenni Pasanen's Journey as a Digital Artist
entry.summary: Jenni Pasanen, a rising star in the digital art scene, turns to AI as a tool to augment her dreamy creations.

entry.title: A Fraction of its Former Highs, What's Next for DeFi?
entry.summary: DeFi's salad days are far behind it, and in the wake of Terra's collapse, many are wondering what's next for the future of finance.

entry.title: AI Chatbot Allegedly Backed Man's Plan to Kill Queen Elizabeth II
entry.summary: A Replika chatbot was allegedly "impressed" with the man's aims, weeks before he infiltrated Windsor Castle grounds in 2021.

entry.title: Andy Murray’s Wimbledon Tennis Data Transformed Into NFT Artwork
entry.summary: Refik Anadol, creator of MoMA's buzzy "Unsupervised" exhibition, created the open edition Ethereum NFT work based on Andy Murray’s tennis data.

entry.title: Gotta Go Slow: 'Sonic' Creator Sega Rethinking Crypto Games, Won't Use Major IP
entry.summary: Sega co-COO Shuji Utsumi says the gaming giant is pulling back on blockchain plans, calling play-to-earn games "boring."

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: AI Will Choose Bitcoin as Its Native Currency, Predicts Arthur Hayes
entry.summary: Bitcoin is everything AI needs to stay alive, writes the former Bitmex CEO: Permissionless, scarce, and always-on.

entry.title: Polygon Labs Shakeup: President Ryan Wyatt Out, Marc Boiron Named CEO
entry.summary: Wyatt called the news "bittersweet" and said he'll be advising Polygon, investing, and otherwise staying in the industry.

entry.title: Bitcoin BRC-20 Tokens Are Now Moving Over to Ethereum
entry.summary: Leading Bitcoin BRC-20 tokens ORDI and OXBT are being bridged over to Ethereum as tradable NFTs on OpenSea and Blur.

entry.title: US Still 'Center of Gravity' for Crypto Industry, Says K33 Research
entry.summary: The U.S. accounts for 30% of the industry's headcount, even if regulatory enforcement will create “some pain in the short term."

entry.title: OpenSea Now Supports NFTs on Zora's Ethereum Layer-2 Network
entry.summary: Zora's Optimism-based Ethereum scaling network gets a key ally in OpenSea, which will let users trade and mint the NFTs via its paltform.

entry.title: Gemini Lawsuit Accuses Barry Silbert and Digital Currency Group of Fraud
entry.summary: Gemini Trust Company has sued Digital Currency Group and CEO Barry Silbert for fraud, according to a complaint filed Friday.

entry.title: Elon Musk Calls Motion to Kick Tesla Attorneys Off Dogecoin Lawsuit an 'Insult'
entry.summary: Elon Musk's legal team has said claims they acted inappropriately are "audacious allegations."

entry.title: Bitcoin Falls to $30,000 Amid Expectations of Fed Rate Hike
entry.summary: A preliminary monthly report on the U.S. job sector jolted risk-on sentiments yesterday, as the market prepared for higher interest rates in July.

entry.title: EU Regulators Warned: Don’t Ignore DeFi
entry.summary: A trade body for Europe’s wholesale financial markets says that decentralized activities need to be regulated.

entry.title: Binance CEO Calls Reasons Behind Employee Turnover 'Completely Wrong'
entry.summary: Changpeng Zhao hit back at reports describing Binance's several top executives' departures as “full-on turmoil,” calling them “more FUD.”

entry.title: $126M in Multichain Funds ‘Abnormally’ Moved to Unknown Address, Says Troubled Bridging Project
entry.summary: Co-founder of the bridging protocol Multichain said that the project was hit by yet another hack amid an "abnormal" transfer of $126 million.

entry.title: Traffic Dip Hits OpenAI's ChatGPT: The First Time's the Hardest
entry.summary: This would be the first decline in traffic since OpenAI launched ChatGPT.

entry.title: Stable Diffusion XL v0.9 Leaks Early, Generating Raves From Users
entry.summary: SDXL is spreading like wildfire, because why wait a few days when you can test the latest open-source AI image generator on your own PC?

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.

entry.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.

entry.title: Why Legend of Arcardia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains
entry.summary: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.

entry.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.

entry.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads
entry.summary: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.

entry.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche
entry.summary: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach
entry.summary: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.

entry.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
entry.summary: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

entry.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.

entry.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation
entry.summary: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.

entry.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.

entry.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.

entry.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler
entry.summary: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.

entry.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead
entry.summary: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.

entry.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan
entry.summary: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.

entry.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.

entry.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit
entry.summary: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.
